mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RE( RE_BNO, RE_NO, RE_UID, RE_CONTENT, RE_STATUS) VALUES(#{bno},#{no},#{id},#{content},'P')
mapper.select: SELECT RE_BNO AS "bno", RE_NO AS "no", RE_UID AS "id", RE_REGDATE AS "regdate", RE_CONTENT AS "content", RE_STATUS AS "status", RE_UPDDATE AS "upddate" FROM RE WHERE RE_BNO = #{bno}
SELECT count(*) FROM RE WHERE RE_BNO = #{bno}
